text: yudevvangen samaharek (dharma) vadan (ēvāyē arthayan) venas vana sē peralā hariṇa atara, (nabiyē! obaṭa “oba kiyū dæyaṭa) api savan dunnemu. ehet api (eyaṭa) venaskam karannemu” (yayi pavasā obagē) dharmayehi væradi kīmaṭa “(nabiyē! metek) obaṭa æsīmaṭa nohæki dæya oba asanu” yayida pavasā rāyinā yayi muva æda kara, edāḍavannāha. (rāyinā yana vacanayaṭa arābi basin “apaṭa udav karanu (salakanu) mænava!” yayi arthaya vē. ehet yudevvangē basin nam, “mōḍayā!” yayi arthaya vē. ebævin mē andamaṭa ovun nokiyā, ē venuvaṭa ovun obaṭa “nabiyē! oba kiyū dæyaṭa) api savan dunnemu. (obaṭa) api avanata vunemu. (api kiyana dæya) oba asanu” (yayi kiyā rāyinā yana vacanaya venuvaṭa) unlūrnā (apava ādarayen yutuva balanu mænava!)” yayida pavasā tibuṇē nam, eya ovunṭama itāmat hon̆dak vaśayenda, ṛju ekak vaśayenda tikhennaṭa tibuṇi. ehet ovungē pratikṣēpayē hētuven allāh ovunva śāpa kara hæriyēya. ebævin (ovungē) samahareku hæra, (væḍi deneku) viśvāsavantayin vannēma næta
